channel.title: [Camp Pursuivant] Neon City Overdrive: Moving Fortress
channel.description:
**Warning: This Event is available only to the members of Camp Pursuivant (facilitator camp).**
Reyes-Okoye, the largest pharmaceutical company in Neon City has developed a new biological weapon which might be a game-changer with the fragile and complex balance of corporate and criminal powers in the sprawl. The buyer is unkown, but we know that next sunday the weapon will be transported from the company headquarters to an undisclosed location. The shipment will be heavily guarded.
We also know that everyone important wants to get their hands on the cargo. Yourself included.
--------
**Neon City Overdrive** is a game of fast-paced cyberpunk action. Knowledge of the system is not required -- rules will be taught at the game.
-------- **Content Warning:** Violence and crime. **Duration:** 3 hours **Breaks:** a 10-minute break at the end of each hour. **Safety Tools:** X-Card, Lines & Veils, Open Door Policy. This event will follow the [Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html). **Venue:** GM's Zoom. **Recording:** The session will be recorded but will only be made public with the consent of all participants.
[date=2021-09-19 time=15:00:00 timezone="Europe/Zagreb"] [https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MiqL-UgXECKNo3vOp2e](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MiqL-UgXECKNo3vOp2e)

Warning: This Event is available only to the members of Camp Pursuivant (facilitator camp).

Reyes-Okoye, the largest pharmaceutical company in Neon City has developed a new biological weapon which might be a game-changer with the fragile and complex balance of corporate and criminal powers in the sprawl. The buyer is unkown, but we know that next sunday the weapon will be transported from the company headquarters to an undisclosed location. The shipment will be heavily guarded.

We also know that everyone important wants to get their hands on the cargo. Yourself included.

Neon City Overdrive is a game of fast-paced cyberpunk action. Knowledge of the system is not required – rules will be taught at the game.
